Hack.help: You perform a standard attack with your Ninja Blade. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more lethal damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Hack.targetHelp: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Slash.help: You perform a quick slash with your Ninja Blade. This attack is very fast, but deals only minor lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Slash.targetHelp: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Shurikens.help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.
Shurikens.targetHelp: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Slice.help: You swing your Ninja Blade in a wide arc in front of you, slicing multiple foes with lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. If executed while hidden, all affected targets have a chance to be hit with a Critical for extra damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Slice.targetHelp: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Ninja_Reflexes.help: Activating your Ninja Reflexes enables you to be more evasive to melee, range and area effect attacks. This will increase your Defense versus melee as long as it is active. Ninja Reflexes also grants you resistance to Defense DeBuffs.
Ninja_Reflexes.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +DEF(Melee, Ranged, AoE), Res(DeBuff DEF), +Perception

Caltrops.help: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

Parry.help: You can use your Ninja Blade to parry incoming melee attacks and then quickly return the favor. Divine Avalanche does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Exploding_Shuriken.help: This small throwing star is rigged to explode on impact. You must have two other Weapon Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Danger_Sense.help: Activating your Danger Sense enables you to be more evasive to melee, range and area effect attacks. This will increase your Defense versus melee as long as it is active. Danger Sense also grants you resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilization, Confusion, Fear, and Defense DeBuffs as well as resistance to Psionic damage.
Danger_Sense.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +DEF(Melee, Ranged, AoE), Res(DeBuff DEF), +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Psionics), +Perception

Disembowel.help: You perform a powerful Soaring Dragon maneuver that deals a great amount of lethal damage, and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate
Disembowel.targetHelp: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Kuji-In_Sha.help: Kuji-In Sha invokes the power of Sha, or healing. Focusing your inner power, you can heal your body of its wounds and leave yourself resistant to the effects of Toxic damage for a while. Recharge: Long

Kuji-In_Retsu.help: Kuji-In Retsu is the mastery of space and time. Focusing your power on Retsu enables you to control your own time to easily defeat your foes. Mastery of this power enables you to avoid almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed, jumping height and Endurance Recovery are also increased. Retsu also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs. When Retsu wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long

Head_Splitter.help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of lethal damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce his Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. If executed while hidden, only some affected targets may be hit with a Critical, however, there is a chance you may land a Critical hit with Golden Dragonfly even if you are not Hidden. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Head_Splitter.targetHelp: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
